citations.narrative:
Upon records review, it was discovered on February 15, 2023, an adult female ring-tailed lemur housed on one of two
lemur islands was found deceased from suspected drowning in the surrounding moat during morning observations. This
lemur had been recently introduced to the island and was apparently healthy prior to the introduction. Unsound primary
enclosures may lead to injury if they do not safely contain the animals. The primary enclosure for non-human primates
must protect them from injury. Corrective actions had been developed and implemented prior to inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility director and staff.
n

narrative:
3.80(a)(2)(ii)  Critical
   
Primary enclosures. 
Upon records review, it was discovered on February 15, 2023, an adult female ring-tailed lemur housed on one of two 
lemur islands was found deceased from suspected drowning in the surrounding moat during morning observations. This 
lemur had been recently introduced to the island and was apparently healthy prior to the introduction. Unsound primary 
enclosures may lead to injury if they do not safely contain the animals. The primary enclosure for non-human primates 
must protect them from injury. Corrective actions had been developed and implemented prior to inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility director and staff. 
 
 n
